comedones.description: Blackheads and whiteheads - clogged pores without inflammation

cleansers.name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser
cleansers.why_it_works: BHA penetrates pores to dissolve oil and dead skin cells
cleansers.how_to_use: Use twice daily, morning and night

cleansers.name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Cleanser
cleansers.why_it_works: Gentle exfoliation for sensitive skin, removes excess oil
cleansers.how_to_use: Use morning and evening on damp skin

treatments.name: Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
treatments.why_it_works: Liquid formula penetrates deeper, unclogs pores effectively
treatments.how_to_use: Apply after cleansing, before moisturizer (PM only initially)

treatments.name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
treatments.how_to_use: Apply few drops before moisturizer AM/PM

moisturizers.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
moisturizers.why_it_works: Lightweight, oil-free hydration won't clog pores
moisturizers.how_to_use: Apply morning and night as final step

comedones.routine: Cleanse → BHA Treatment (PM) → Niacinamide → Moisturize → SPF (AM)
comedones.pro_tip: Introduce BHA gradually (2-3x per week) to avoid irritation

papules.description: Inflamed red bumps without pus - inflammatory acne

cleansers.name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser
cleansers.how_to_use: Use once daily (evening), increase to 2x if tolerated

treatments.name: Differin Gel (Adapalene 0.1%)
treatments.why_it_works: Prevents clogged pores, reduces inflammation, FDA-approved for acne
treatments.how_to_use: Pea-sized amount on entire face at night (start 2-3x/week)

treatments.name: Benzoyl Peroxide Spot Treatment 5-10%
treatments.why_it_works: Kills P. acnes bacteria causing inflammation

moisturizers.name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer
moisturizers.why_it_works: Repairs skin barrier, reduces inflammation, oil-free

papules.timeline: 6-8 weeks for improvement, 12 weeks for optimal results
papules.pro_tip: Always use SPF - retinoids increase sun sensitivity. Start slow to build tolerance.
papules.when_to_see_doctor: If no improvement after 12 weeks or if acne worsens

pustules.description: Inflamed bumps with white/yellow pus - active bacterial infection

cleansers.name: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash 10%
cleansers.why_it_works: Maximum OTC strength BP kills bacteria causing pustules
cleansers.how_to_use: Once daily (evening), leave on 1-2 minutes before rinsing

treatments.name: Differin Gel + Benzoyl Peroxide (combo therapy)
treatments.why_it_works: Retinoid prevents clogs + BP kills bacteria (gold standard combo)
treatments.how_to_use: Differin PM, BP spot treatment AM or alternate nights

treatments.name: Mighty Patch Original
treatments.why_it_works: Draws out pus, protects from picking, speeds healing
treatments.how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry pustule overnight

treatments.name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo (+)
treatments.why_it_works: Kills bacteria + reduces inflammation + prevents scarring

moisturizers.name: Cetaphil Pro Oil Removing Foam Wash + Moisturizer SPF 30

pustules.routine: Cleanse (BP wash) → Differin (PM) → BP spot treatment → Moisturize → Hydrocolloid patch
pustules.timeline: Individual pustules: 3-7 days. Overall improvement: 8-12 weeks
pustules.pro_tip: DO NOT pop pustules - use hydrocolloid patches instead. Change pillowcases frequently.
pustules.when_to_see_doctor: If pustules are large, painful, or not responding to OTC treatments after 8 weeks - may need oral antibiotics

nodules.description: Deep, painful, solid bumps under skin - severe inflammatory acne

cleansers.name: Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser
cleansers.why_it_works: Gentle enough for inflamed skin, won't worsen irritation

treatments.name: SEE A DERMATOLOGIST (Priority)
treatments.why_it_works: Nodular acne requires prescription treatment (oral antibiotics, Accutane, spironolactone)

treatments.name: Differin Gel (while waiting for appointment)
treatments.why_it_works: Can help prevent new nodules from forming

treatments.name: Ice + Anti-inflammatory (immediate relief)
treatments.how_to_use: Apply ice wrapped in cloth for 5-10 min, 3x daily

nodules.routine: GENTLE cleanse → Prescription treatment → Rich moisturizer → SPF 50+
nodules.timeline: Individual nodules: 2-4 weeks to resolve. Overall: Requires medical treatment.
nodules.pro_tip: NEVER squeeze or pick nodules - causes scarring. Apply ice for pain/swelling.
nodules.when_to_see_doctor: IMMEDIATELY - nodular acne requires professional treatment. Can cause permanent scarring.

mixed.description: Combination of multiple acne types (common scenario)
mixed.routine: Gentle Cleanse → Retinoid (PM) → Spot treatments → Moisturize → SPF
mixed.products: Use papule/pustule routine + spot treat individual lesions based on type

do: Apply SPF 30+ every morning (especially with retinoids)
Introduce new products one at a time (wait 2 weeks between)
Be patient - most treatments need 8-12 weeks
dont: Pop, pick, or squeeze acne (causes scarring)
Use too many actives at once (irritation makes acne worse)
Over-wash face (strips natural oils, worsens acne)
Touch your face throughout the day
diet_considerations: Limit dairy (linked to acne in some people)
Reduce high-glycemic foods (white bread, sugary foods)

moderate.treatment: OTC retinoid (Differin) + Benzoyl Peroxide, consider dermatologist
moderate.see_doctor: If OTC doesn't work after 12 weeks or worsening
